title: Sample Book, 1939
medium: Medium: silk, rayon, wool, linen, cotton, paper, cardboard
description: Sample book with a white cardboard cover and large red and black printed title "Rodier." Spring and Summer Catalogue. Contains 389 samples of both woven and printed fabrics: 276 wool, 4 silk, 5 printed silk, 21 rayon jersey, 22 wool and rayon, 4 printed spun rayon, 20 printed rayon, 10 rayon and cotton, 3 rayon, 9 wool, rayon, and metallic, 8 linen, 3 printed linen. Book also contains 15 sketches with fashion suggestions for fabrics.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: silk, rayon, wool, linen, cotton, paper, cardboard. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-4.
